name: Footwork
description: Footwork drills to improve agility and speed.

workout_groups.name: Tactical Footwork Drills
workout_groups.description: Rapid direction changes and dodging techniques.

workouts.name: Basic Footwork Drills
workouts.description: Practice basic footwork drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Footwork Drills
workouts.description: Practice advanced footwork drills for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Footwork with Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Practice footwork drills with resistance bands for 10 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Ladder Drills
workout_groups.description: Footwork drills using an agility ladder to improve speed and coordination.

workouts.name: Basic Ladder Drills
workouts.description: Perform basic ladder drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Ladder Drills
workouts.description: Perform advanced ladder drills for 15 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Cone Drills
workout_groups.description: Agility drills using cones to improve quickness and change of direction.

workouts.name: Basic Cone Drills
workouts.description: Perform basic cone drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Intermediate Cone Drills
workouts.description: Perform intermediate cone drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Cone Drills with Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform advanced cone drills with resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Cone Drills with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform advanced cone drills with sparring for 20 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Cone Drills with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform advanced cone drills with sparring and resistance bands for 20 minutes.

workouts.name: Weighted Vest Cone Drills with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform advanced cone drills with sparring and resistance bands and weighted vest for 20 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Cone Drills
workouts.description: Perform advanced cone drills for 15 minutes.
